description: A heavily muscled man with an eyepatch and multiple facial scars sits at a bar, wearing a large vice-like device clamped onto his head, holding a cigarette in his mouth, and gripping a coffee mug. Beside him, a smaller, bespectacled man in a suit and fedora looks at him while holding a drink. The scene highlights the absurd lengths one might go to project an image of toughness, contrasting the brutal appearance and head-crushing device with the mundane setting of a bar and the act of drinking coffee, creating a surreal juxtaposition of extreme self-inflicted hardship and casual everyday life.
caption: “Tough-guy, huh?”
